curam.util.type

Class StringHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.type.StringHelper

  • public abstract class StringHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class for manipulating String values.

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String EMPTY_STRING
      An empty string.

      Trims whitespace from both ends of the string supplied.

    • Method Detail

      • isEmpty

        public static boolean isEmpty(java.lang.String string)
        Tests whether the string supplied has any non-whitespace characters.
        Parameters:
        string - the string to test.
        Returns:
        true if the string supplied is null, empty or contains only whitespace characters.

      • trim

        public static java.lang.String trim(java.lang.String string)
        Trims whitespace from both ends of the string supplied, and compresses any contiguous embedded spaces to a single space. Converts a null to an empty string.
        Parameters:
        string - the string to be trimmed.
        Returns:
        the resultant string with whitespace trimmed from both ends and internal spaces compressed.

      • trimExternal

        public static java.lang.String trimExternal(java.lang.String string)
        Trims whitespace from both ends of the string supplied. Converts a null to an empty string.
        Parameters:
        string - the string to be trimmed.
        Returns:
        the resultant string with whitespace trimmed from both ends.
        See Also:
        String.trim()

      • zero2EmptyString

        public static java.lang.String zero2EmptyString(long value)
        Converts a long value to its standard string representation, converting the sentinel value zero to an empty string.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert to a string.
        Returns:
        the standard string representation of the long supplied, or an empty string if the value supplied was zero.
        See Also:
        String.valueOf(long)
